name: RemoveTaskFromProject
description:
Remove a task from the specified project in Asana.

Removes a task from a specified project within Asana. The task continues to exist in the system but will no longer be associated with the project. Requires 'tasks:write' scope.

parameters.name: task_identifier
parameters.description: The unique identifier of the task to remove from the project.

parameters.name: project_to_remove_task_from
parameters.description: The identifier of the project from which the task will be removed.

value_schema.description: The project to remove the task from.

parameters.name: enable_pretty_output
parameters.description: Enable 'pretty' response formatting. Provides line breaks and indentation for readability, useful mainly for debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the asana API.

parameters.name: opt_pretty
parameters.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

value_schema.description:
Provides “pretty” output.
Provides the response in a “pretty” format. In the case of JSON this means doing proper line breaking and indentation to make it readable. This will take extra time and increase the response size so it is advisable only to use this during debugging.

parameters.name: data.project
parameters.description: The project to remove the task from.

value_schema.description: The project to remove the task from.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
